translations: v．嘘声，使安静：用嘘声让某人安静下来或停止说话。
· The librarian shushes the noisy students.
图书馆管理员让吵闹的学生安静下来。

sentences.sentence: My daughter on the other hand, is more cautious - she shushes me when she sees I am about to say hello to a strange woman by the subway stop.
sentences.translation: 另一方面，我的女儿则更谨慎一些——她一看到我准备向地铁站的陌生女人打招呼时就悄声制止我。
